a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.p: We aspire to be a premier school system that will set the new standard of excellence.
The mission of Webberville Community Schools is to provide a progressive, personalized education in a safe and caring environment by a dedicated vision-driven staff.
The Ingham Intermediate School District has approved Webberville Community Schools Continuity Plan.
Want to attend a board meeting this month?
